verbs.description: storify (third-person singular simple present storifies, present participle storifying, simple past and past participle storified)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To form or tell stories of; to narrate or describe in a story.
(beekeeping, transitive) To store (additional honey) in additional tiers or stories of a hive.
examples: The advocates for the storifying system boast, that it is highly favourable to the formation of artificial swarms; it should, however, be previously demonstrated, that any actual advantage is to be derived from an artificial swarm.
